sentences.en: Storytelling has been proposed as one alternative.
sentences.cn: 讲故事是被提议的一种选择。

sentences.en: Little kids can learn a lot including storytelling, poems and music.
sentences.cn: 小孩子可以学到很多东西，包括讲故事、诗歌和音乐。

sentences.en: There are also storytelling activities for children, which can teach them to be strong and kind.
sentences.cn: 还有给孩子讲故事的活动，可以教会他们坚强和善良。
